post.body: my bed for the next wk is a sleep number bed and at setting 35 it makes my back ache. lets try 50...
2012, we're all SOL, says nostradomus. i cant help but wonder if it'll come true.
pacific ocean at sunset
i go outside and my eyes immediately start pouring, damn allergies.
just saw another dog, this time in the actual mall. i dont get it.
some lady has a small dog on a leash in macys. uh only in southern california i guess?
rain in san diego today. time to go to the mall, this should be interesting. on a better note, my uncle makes bomb crepes
going to bed at 9 pm san diego time. i feel pathetic. but jet lag and yesterdays travelling mess has made me exhausted
the margaritas are strong and the salsa is hot as hell. cute surfer server, though.
eating mexican food by the pacific ocean.. i hope mexican food is better here than in ohio, were an hour away from mexico after all
starving. breakfast and relaxing after a long night, then hitting up the beach for a while. jealous?
west coast for the next 11 days... worst flight of my life for sure. hate san diego fog
stupid CAK airport is playing christmas music still. ive heard enough already, srsly
Ooooh hai SAN DIEGO. T-minus 12 hours until my ass greets the west coast. Today's goal: don't get lost in Chicago's O'Hare airport.
youngstown barsss for nye. happy new years everyone be safe!
bored. I want to shop. Supposed to go with dad today but he's "too hungover" uhh WHAT. totally unlike him.
I miss school. Well, scratch that. I miss being in Franklin Hall, dancing with Adam to Mgmt and annoying the newsroom with Love Lockdown.
is all ready for Christmas. Done with shopping and wrapping. Too bad I'm STILL not really in the spirit. Hopefully tomorrow it'll kick in.
family christmas party today. so excited.
first time to the rec in a semester.
